main.name: Sokheng Teang
main.description: I am a young and ambitious programmer with a passion for developing innovative applications. I have a robust academic background and will graduate with an associate degree from Riverside City College in Mathematic and Behavioral Scince. I also have experience working in programming from completing a coding booth camp from Flatiron. I am confident that I have the ability to become a valuable member of any team, and I am eager to use my skills to develop cutting-edge software solutions
main.bio: Full-stack Software Engineer eager to contribute to team success through hard work, attention to detail, and strong communication skills. Training in (Ruby on Rails, React, and JavaScript). Developing a growth mindset as I learn, grow, and succeed in technology. I'm looking for a firm that recognizes my tenacity and ability to learn. Aside from programming, I also enjoy going for walks on the beach. I find that it's a great way to clear my head and relax. I also enjoy hiking and making food. I find both of these activities to be fun and rewarding.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
